FuncDef: This command creates a RADIUS-proxy server in the corresponding routing instance. The proxy server can be configured for the purpose of proxying authentication or accounting or both.
CLIs: server <server-name> [ create ] [ purpose { [ accounting | authentication ] } ] [ wlan-gw-group <group-id> ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the RADIUS-proxy server.
Specifies that the system will create the specified RADIUS-proxy server.
Specifies the purpose the RADIUS-proxy server. Values-accounting - proxy accounting packets.
